comments.body: Can we update the docs above? -> ` Create a [[AddFileCommand]], [[AddJarCommand]], [[ListFilesCommand]] or  ... `

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +361,365 @@          case "file" => AddFileCommand(maybePaths)
          case "jar" => AddJarCommand(maybePaths)
          case "archive" => AddArchiveCommand(maybePaths)
          case other => operationNotAllowed(s"ADD with resource type '$other'", ctx)
        }
